remarks: Restricted specialization, using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
rspcimdv.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
rspcimdv.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
rspcimdv $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. B ps -> ch ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
